li.a: How to use Aeries Parent Portal

div.data-alt: Staff working on a team project
Ariel view of an elementary school
Giant inflatable of a of the bird mascot for Bear River School
Plaque for California Gold River School for Bear River School
A rock with a painting on it with stars, clouds and a crescent moon. Text says "Dare Dream Do. Dare to dream than do it. Dream Big, Bear River School 2015-2016."
Students attending the flag raising ceremony.
Mural on the side of the Lone Tree School. Mural has a variety of aircraft. Mural says, "Team Lone Tree, Beale Air Force Base. Lone Tree School Wheatland Charter Academy."
Close up shot of "Team Lone Tree, Beale Air Force Base" mural.
Close up shot of the mural with a variety of aircraft. "Lone Tree School, Wheatland Charter Academy"
Front of Lone Tree School. Digital billboard that says, "Team Lone Tree. Lone Tree School Wheatland Charter Preschool. 87 degrees fahrenheit 9:39am
Mural on a wood wall with the Wheatland Elementary school mascot. "Jr Falcons"
School buildings with a couple of oak trees in a grassy area
Close up of rocks in front of a school building
A playground structure in front of school buildings.
Front of Bear River School with a banner on an overhand that says "Life is good at Bear River School"

Stairs of Lone Tree School with "The Learning Awakens, I am as strong as a wookie, as daring as Han Solo, as wise as Yoda, as brave as Skywalker, master I shall be! Team Lone Tree Renaissance 16/17" written on the stairs.
Bear River Mascot Mural
WSD District Office
Red Schoolhouse
Little Red Schoolhouse

div.h2: District Office Hours during School Closure
*03/30/2020 Please Click on your individual school to Connect to the Distance Learning for that School.

strong.a: Click here for resources for learning from home.

div.div: Please click on the links below and enjoy these pictures. Know that we miss you all and look forward to the day we can all be together again.

div.h2: Please Click Here for Information on the Meal Service during school closure.

em.strong: Thank you for all you do for the students and staff in the Wheatland School District!
